mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_LAYOUT ( F_LAYOUT_ID, F_OWNER_PAGE_ID, F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID, F_LAYOUT_TYPE, F_TARGET_FIELD_ID, F_CONST_MESSAGE_ID, F_WIDGET_WIDGET_ID, F_LAYOUT_PARAM, F_STYLE_STYLE_ID, F_LEFT, F_TOP, F_RIGHT, F_BOTTOM, F_WIDTH, F_HEIGHT, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ layoutId }, #{ ownerPageId }, #{ parentLayoutId }, #{ layoutType }, #{ targetFieldId }, #{ constMessageId }, #{ widgetWidgetId }, #{ layoutParam }, #{ styleStyleId }, #{ left }, #{ top }, #{ right }, #{ bottom }, #{ width }, #{ height }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_LAYOUT SET F_OWNER_PAGE_ID = #{ ownerPageId }, F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID = #{ parentLayoutId }, F_LAYOUT_TYPE = #{ layoutType }, F_TARGET_FIELD_ID = #{ targetFieldId }, F_CONST_MESSAGE_ID = #{ constMessageId }, F_WIDGET_WIDGET_ID = #{ widgetWidgetId }, F_LAYOUT_PARAM = #{ layoutParam }, F_STYLE_STYLE_ID = #{ styleStyleId }, F_LEFT = #{ left }, F_TOP = #{ top }, F_RIGHT = #{ right }, F_BOTTOM = #{ bottom }, F_WIDTH = #{ width }, F_HEIGHT = #{ height }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_LAYOUT_ID = #{ layoutId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_LAYOUT_ID AS "layoutId", T1.F_OWNER_PAGE_ID AS "ownerPageId", T1.F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID AS "parentLayoutId", T1.F_LAYOUT_TYPE AS "layoutType", T1.F_TARGET_FIELD_ID AS "targetFieldId", T1.F_CONST_MESSAGE_ID AS "constMessageId", T1.F_WIDGET_WIDGET_ID AS "widgetWidgetId", T1.F_LAYOUT_PARAM AS "layoutParam", T1.F_STYLE_STYLE_ID AS "styleStyleId", T1.F_LEFT AS "left", T1.F_TOP AS "top", T1.F_RIGHT AS "right", T1.F_BOTTOM AS "bottom", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_HEIGHT AS "height", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_LAYOUT_ID AS "_title", T3.F_PAGE_SET_NAME || '(' || T2.F_WIDTH || 'x' || T2.F_HEIGHT || ')' AS "owner_title", T4.F_LAYOUT_ID AS "parent_title", T6.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T5.F_FIELD_NAME AS "target_title", T7.F_MESSAGE_NAME AS "const_title", T8.F_WIDGET_NAME AS "widget_title", T9.F_STYLE_NAME AS "style_title", T10.F_VALUE_ID AS "layoutType_title" FROM T_LAYOUT T1 LEFT JOIN T_PAGE T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PAGE_ID = T2.F_PAGE_ID LEFT JOIN T_PAGE_SET T3 ON T2.F_OWNER_PAGE_SET_ID = T3.F_PAGE_SET_ID LEFT JOIN T_LAYOUT T4 ON T1.F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID = T4.F_LAYOUT_ID LEFT JOIN T_FIELD T5 ON T1.F_TARGET_FIELD_ID = T5.F_FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T6 ON T5.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T6.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_MESSAGE T7 ON T1.F_CONST_MESSAGE_ID = T7.F_MESSAGE_ID LEFT JOIN T_WIDGET T8 ON T1.F_WIDGET_WIDGET_ID = T8.F_WIDGET_ID LEFT JOIN T_STYLE T9 ON T1.F_STYLE_STYLE_ID = T9.F_STYLE_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM_VALUE T10 ON T10.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = 3 AND T1.F_LAYOUT_TYPE = T10.F_VALUE_ID WHERE T1.F_LAYOUT_ID = #{ layoutId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F_LAYOUT_ID) AS "maxLayoutId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_LAYOUT T1

SELECT T1.F_PAGE_ID AS "pageId", T1.F_OWNER_PAGE_SET_ID AS "ownerPageSetId", T1.F_CONTEXT_CLASS_ID AS "contextClassId", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_HEIGHT AS "height", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T2.F_PAGE_SET_NAME || '(' || T1.F_WIDTH || 'x' || T1.F_HEIGHT || ')' AS "_title", T2.F_PAGE_SET_NAME AS "owner_title", T3.F_CLASS_NAME || '(' || T3.F_TITLE || ')' AS "context_title" FROM T_PAGE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PAGE_SET T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PAGE_SET_ID = T2.F_PAGE_SET_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T3 ON T1.F_CONTEXT_CLASS_ID = T3.F_CLASS_ID WHERE T1.F_PAGE_ID = #{ ownerPageId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F_PAGE_ID) AS "maxPageId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_PAGE T1
T2.F_PAGE_SET_NAME || '(' || T1.F_WIDTH || 'x' || T1.F_HEIGHT || ')' LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_LAYOUT_ID AS "layoutId", T1.F_OWNER_PAGE_ID AS "ownerPageId", T1.F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID AS "parentLayoutId", T1.F_LAYOUT_TYPE AS "layoutType", T1.F_TARGET_FIELD_ID AS "targetFieldId", T1.F_CONST_MESSAGE_ID AS "constMessageId", T1.F_WIDGET_WIDGET_ID AS "widgetWidgetId", T1.F_LAYOUT_PARAM AS "layoutParam", T1.F_STYLE_STYLE_ID AS "styleStyleId", T1.F_LEFT AS "left", T1.F_TOP AS "top", T1.F_RIGHT AS "right", T1.F_BOTTOM AS "bottom", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_HEIGHT AS "height", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_LAYOUT_ID AS "_title", T3.F_PAGE_SET_NAME || '(' || T2.F_WIDTH || 'x' || T2.F_HEIGHT || ')' AS "owner_title", T4.F_LAYOUT_ID AS "parent_title", T6.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T5.F_FIELD_NAME AS "target_title", T7.F_MESSAGE_NAME AS "const_title", T8.F_WIDGET_NAME AS "widget_title", T9.F_STYLE_NAME AS "style_title", T10.F_VALUE_ID AS "layoutType_title" FROM T_LAYOUT T1 LEFT JOIN T_PAGE T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PAGE_ID = T2.F_PAGE_ID LEFT JOIN T_PAGE_SET T3 ON T2.F_OWNER_PAGE_SET_ID = T3.F_PAGE_SET_ID LEFT JOIN T_LAYOUT T4 ON T1.F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID = T4.F_LAYOUT_ID LEFT JOIN T_FIELD T5 ON T1.F_TARGET_FIELD_ID = T5.F_FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T6 ON T5.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T6.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_MESSAGE T7 ON T1.F_CONST_MESSAGE_ID = T7.F_MESSAGE_ID LEFT JOIN T_WIDGET T8 ON T1.F_WIDGET_WIDGET_ID = T8.F_WIDGET_ID LEFT JOIN T_STYLE T9 ON T1.F_STYLE_STYLE_ID = T9.F_STYLE_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM_VALUE T10 ON T10.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = 3 AND T1.F_LAYOUT_TYPE = T10.F_VALUE_ID WHERE T1.F_LAYOUT_ID = #{ parentLayoutId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F_LAYOUT_ID) AS "maxLayoutId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_LAYOUT T1
T1.F_LAYOUT_ID LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_FIELD_ID AS "fieldId", T1.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID AS "ownerClassId", T1.F_FIELD_NAME AS "fieldName", T1.F_TYPE AS "type", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_SCALE AS "scale", T1.F_CREF_CLASS_ID AS "crefClassId", T1.F_EREF_ENUM_ID AS "erefEnumId", T1.F_FREF_FIELD_ID AS "frefFieldId", T1.F_PK AS "pk", T1.F_NULLABLE AS "nullable", T1.F_NEEDS_SUM AS "needsSum", T1.F_NEEDS_AVG AS "needsAvg", T1.F_NEEDS_MAX AS "needsMax", T1.F_NEEDS_MIN AS "needsMin", T1.F_IS_CONTAINER AS "isContainer", T1.F_FORMAT AS "format", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T2.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T1.F_FIELD_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_CLASS_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title", T3.F_CLASS_NAME || '(' || T3.F_TITLE || ')' AS "cref_title", T4.F_ENUM_NAME || '(' || T4.F_TITLE || ')' AS "eref_title", T6.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T5.F_FIELD_NAME AS "fref_title", T7.F_VALUE_ID AS "type_title" FROM T_FIELD T1 LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T2.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T3 ON T1.F_CREF_CLASS_ID = T3.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM T4 ON T1.F_EREF_ENUM_ID = T4.F_ENUM_ID LEFT JOIN T_FIELD T5 ON T1.F_FREF_FIELD_ID = T5.F_FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T6 ON T5.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T6.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM_VALUE T7 ON T7.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = 1 AND T1.F_TYPE = T7.F_VALUE_ID WHERE T1.F_FIELD_ID = #{ targetFieldId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F_FIELD_ID) AS "maxFieldId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_FIELD T1
T2.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T1.F_FIELD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_MESSAGE_ID AS "messageId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_MESSAGE_NAME AS "messageName", T1.F_MESSAGE AS "message", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_MESSAGE_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_MESSAGE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_MESSAGE_ID = #{ constMessageId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F_MESSAGE_ID) AS "maxMessageId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_MESSAGE T1
T1.F_MESSAGE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_WIDGET_ID AS "widgetId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_WIDGET_NAME AS "widgetName", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_WIDGET_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_WIDGET T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_WIDGET_ID = #{ widgetWidgetId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F_WIDGET_ID) AS "maxWidgetId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_WIDGET T1
T1.F_WIDGET_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_STYLE_ID AS "styleId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_STYLE_NAME AS "styleName", T1.F_PARENT_STYLE_ID AS "parentStyleId", T1.F_COND AS "cond", T1.F_COND_PARAM AS "condParam", T1.F_TEXT_COLOR AS "textColor", T1.F_BACKGROUND_COLOR AS "backgroundColor", T1.F_BACKGROUND_IMAGE AS "backgroundImage", T1.F_BORDER_LEFT AS "borderLeft", T1.F_BORDER_TOP AS "borderTop", T1.F_BORDER_RIGHT AS "borderRight", T1.F_BORDER_BOTTOM AS "borderBottom", T1.F_BORDER_COLOR AS "borderColor", T1.F_BORDER_IMAGE AS "borderImage", T1.F_FONT_SIZE AS "fontSize", T1.F_FONT_FAMILY AS "fontFamily", T1.F_LINE_HEIGHT AS "lineHeight", T1.F_TEXT_ALIGN AS "textAlign", T1.F_VERTICAL_ALIGN AS "verticalAlign", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_STYLE_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title", T3.F_STYLE_NAME AS "parent_title", T4.F_VALUE_ID AS "cond_title" FROM T_STYLE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN T_STYLE T3 ON T1.F_PARENT_STYLE_ID = T3.F_STYLE_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM_VALUE T4 ON T4.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = 2 AND T1.F_COND = T4.F_VALUE_ID WHERE T1.F_STYLE_ID = #{ styleStyleId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F_STYLE_ID) AS "maxStyleId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_STYLE T1
T1.F_STYLE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'
SELECT MAX(T1.F_LAYOUT_ID) AS "maxLayoutId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_LAYOUT T1 WHERE F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID = #{ content.layoutId }
